question: Which of the following is the purpose of Banking Ombudsman Scheme?
option1: To strengthen the grievance redressal mechanism for banks employees
option2: To strengthen the grievance redressal mechanism for customers
option3: To strengthen the grievance redressal mechanism for female emolyees
answer: To strengthen the grievance redressal mechanism for customers
explanation: Banking ombudsman scheme was introduced with the objective of strengthening the grievance redressal mechanism for customers. It is run by the RBI directly to ensure customer protection in the banking industry.
